site.title: AlgoRhythmics
site.tagline: AI products with a people-first beat.
site.description: AlgoRhythmics is a friendly AI studio building the NodeVoyage travel guide, the Ideonautix founder cockpit, and supportive consulting programmes.

seo.default_title: AlgoRhythmics — AI products with a people-first beat.
seo.default_description: Meet AlgoRhythmics, the AI studio behind NodeVoyage, Ideonautix, and hands-on consulting that keeps teams in control.
seo.default_og_description: AI products with a people-first beat.

home.title: AlgoRhythmics — AI that stays calm under pressure
home.description: Explore NodeVoyage, Ideonautix, and our consulting practice in one welcoming home.
home.og_title: AlgoRhythmics — Calm AI for real teams
home.og_description: AI products and services that feel approachable, transparent, and supportive.

nav.nodevoyage_desc: See our travel co-pilot in action.

hero.tagline: We design friendly AI helpers for travel planners, founders, and partners who value clarity.
hero.subtitle: NodeVoyage, Ideonautix, and our consulting practice share the same promise: honest automation that keeps people confident.
hero.description: Every experience is crafted with accessibility, motion sensitivity, and plain-language explanations so your team always understands the next step.
pillars: One shared design system connects NodeVoyage, Ideonautix, and consulting engagements.
Accessibility and inclusive writing guide every screen, animation, and notification.
We document decisions in plain language so automation remains explainable.

nodevoyage.copy: Your travel co-pilot that plans routes, translates on the fly, and stays reliable offline.

ideonautix.copy: A founder cockpit that combines analytics, rituals, and investor updates in one calm place.

focus.title: Respect for the humans using AI
focus.description: We slow down to explain the why, map the hand-offs, and keep every control easy to discover.
points: Light, dark, and contrast themes stay readable and consistent.
Reduced-motion preferences are honoured across interactions.
Clear audit trails keep AI decisions transparent.

hero.brand_aria: AlgoRhythmics logomark highlighted in the hero heading

cta.title: Stay in our orbit
cta.text: Join the community for relaxed updates, pilot invites, and behind-the-scenes notes.
points: Monthly peeks at NodeVoyage and Ideonautix.
Pilot programmes open to subscribers first.
Accessibility, research, and tooling tips you can use.

story.title: Our story
story.reality_text: We want AI to feel helpful, not hectic. That means clarity for travellers, founders, and anyone leaning on our tools.
story.mission_text: Deliver approachable AI products and services that explain themselves and invite collaboration.
story.vision_text: By 2026, every AlgoRhythmics product will share one trustworthy operating rhythm so partners can switch between them without friction.

founders.title: Meet the founders
founders.subtitle: Two makers blending signage craft with calm AI

nikita.name: Nikita Jurtaevs
nikita.bio: Nikita keeps the story, product direction, and partnerships aligned across NodeVoyage and Ideonautix. His background in signage design helps our digital work stay tactile and clear.
nikita.current_position: Reclame Fabriek — guiding lighting, coatings, and fabrication tests that inspire our interfaces.

slaff.name: Vjaceslavs "Slaff" Trosins
slaff.bio: Slaff leads the engineering stack, data flows, and AI integrations that power our products. Years in signage-controller hardware keep our releases grounded in real-world use.
slaff.position: Reclame Fabriek — evolving controllers, LED systems, and tooling that inform our software choices.
slaff.philosophy: Systems thinking across hardware and software keeps solutions honest and dependable.
achievements: Runs a Google Cloud–first stack with SvelteKit, Flutter, Fastify, Prisma/PostgreSQL, and realtime messaging.
Connects signage-grade controllers with transparent AI experiences.
Leads fundraising and builds multi-disciplinary teams for both flagships.
slaff.brand_intro: We honed our craft while partnering with global brands on premium signage systems:
slaff.brand_context: Projects delivered with Reclame Fabriek (Daugavpils, LV) by both founders
slaff.algorhythmics_vision: Blend signage precision with cloud agility so AlgoRhythmics ships trustworthy, ready-to-use AI experiences.

partners.title: Partners who keep us sharp
partners.description: We build with signage experts today and nurture education partners so our programmes have real impact.
partners.clients_description: Years of signage delivery for retail, finance, and aviation means our AI work stands on proven operations.

ai_companion.name: Lumen

suggestions.title: Explore our AI lab
suggestions.prompt: What makes AlgoRhythmics different from other AI studios?

suggestions.title: NodeVoyage platform
suggestions.prompt: Give me the highlights of the NodeVoyage travel platform.

suggestions.title: Ideonautix suite
suggestions.prompt: How does the Ideonautix productivity suite support teams?

suggestions.title: Improve my AI strategy
suggestions.prompt: How could AlgoRhythmics level up our AI initiative?

knowledgeBase.answer: AlgoRhythmics pairs workshop-grade engineering with a relaxed communication style. We ship our own flagships while coaching partners through the same R&D rituals.
NodeVoyage is our intelligent travel guide. Graph-powered itineraries, contextual storytelling, and adaptive agents help every trip feel personal and stress-free.
Ideonautix is a suite of collaborative AI copilots for knowledge teams. It supports ideation sessions, decision intelligence, and automation while keeping humans in control.
Reach our consulting crew through the contact page or email hello@algorhythmics.com. We love shaping proofs of concept and long-term partnerships alike.
Start with a discovery sprint: we map your goals, audit current data flows, and co-design a focused AI assistant. Together we plan iteration loops so momentum lasts.

ai_companion.fallback: I'm still learning, yet I can connect you with the team or share highlights about our products, studio culture, and services.
